attributes.action: takes whatever steps are necessary to persuade Sony to withdraw their War Game - Resistance: Fall of Man - which is set in Machester Cathedral.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that the setting (Manchester Cathedral) of this "game" is offensive to the majority of citizens of the UK. We believe it is yet another step in destroying / undermining traditional British values. We call upon you to take whatever steps you feel are appropriate to bring together other political parties, religions, family groups, the media and the general public to bring pressure to bear upon Sony. The aim is that Sony will withdraw the game.
We also hope that you will find some way of introducing legislation that will prevent this happening again.
